attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be an obscentiy if MPs received a pay rise this year when so many UK citizens are losing their jobs.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament, which is responsible for setting MPs' pay. Government sets ministers' pay, and has already announced it will be frozen this year.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
